/** RankingGame
 * 
 *  This is the main component for the app.
 *  It controls the page rendering based on the currentPage state in the Redux store.
 * 
 *  It is also the parent component for all the other components.
 * 
*/import React from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{advancePage}from'./features/game/gameSlice';import{PAGES}from'./features/constants';import SplashPage from'./components/Splash/SplashPage';import InputPage from'./components/Input/InputPage';import MatchupPage from'./components/Matchup/MatchupPage';import ResultsPage from'./components/Results/ResultsPage';import BugPage from'./components/Bug/BugPage';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RankingGame=()=>{const currentPage=useSelector(state=>state.game.currentPage);const dispatch=useDispatch();switch(currentPage){case PAGES.SPLASH:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SplashPage,{onAdvance:()=>dispatch(advancePage())});case PAGES.INPUT:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputPage,{onAdvance:()=>dispatch(advancePage())});case PAGES.MATCHUP:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MatchupPage,{onAdvance:()=>dispatch(advancePage())});case PAGES.RESULTS:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResultsPage,{});case PAGES.BUG:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BugPage,{});default:console.error('Error: Unknown currentPage',currentPage);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Error: Unknown page"});}};export default RankingGame;
